content.raw:
I couldn't make this work either with 2.8.12.2.

UPDATE:

I managed to make it work with 2.8.12.2; I had made a previous mistake with capitalization.
~~~
find_package(gazebo  REQUIRED)
message(STATUS "GAZEBO ${gazebo_VERSION_MAJOR}.${gazebo_VERSION_MINOR}.${gazebo_VERSION_PATCH}")
# displays GAZEBO 4.0.0
~~~
I had to use lower-case variables in the variable since I searched for lower-case `gazebo`.

This seems to be working for me, so I think it is ready to go.
